name: Camera Sound off! (root)
description: Turn off the annoying phone camera sound of your default Android camera! Finally succeed snapshots of animals or babies without scaring them!  Please note ... * This app requires ROOT privileges on the device. * It is the first BETA version of the app. * Some devices are not yet supported. * It also can disable S-Pen sound.  Therefore, I ask for help. If the app should not be able to turn off the camera sound on your device, so please send me a comment / email with your device name and the version of Android and I will fix the problem asap. Thank you! :-)  Works on all devices by ... *Samsung *Nexus *Motorola *Sony Ericsson  Dont work on some devices by ... *LG (The LGs camera app has own not removable sound files!) *Alcatel *Micromax
